title: Bug 13189 - Context Menu Override by Message Dialog During Field Deletion Refactoring
description:
While operating on Linux Motif and w2k environments:
1. Set up JUnit.
2. [Missing steps - presumably, perform actions that lead to the bug].
OB: Upon attempting to delete a field, instead of displaying the expected context menu, a prompt immediately appears asking whether the getter/setter should also be deleted.
EB: Expectation: The context menu should appear when deleting a field, offering options without immediately prompting for deletion of associated getter/setter.
SR: [Missing steps to reproduce the issue - e.g., steps to perform field deletion triggering the unexpected prompt for deletion of getter/setter].
